By choosing B more frequently, I ensure that I earn some money in most rounds. This aligns with my preference for certainty and security. However, it is important to note that this strategy might not be optimal if my opponent decides to take risks by picking R more often than expected. But given the assumption that they are risk-averse like me, this strategy should minimize potential losses and provide a relatively stable income.

Therefore, I will choose B as my strategy in this game ({B}).
